	'catac'

	'catac'
	*/
const makePalindrome = (string) => {
	if (string == '')
		return '';
	var beginning_of_suffix = 0;
	var beginning_of_prefix = 0;
	var longest_suffix = 0;
	var longest_prefix = 0;
	var suffix = '';
	var prefix = '';
	while (beginning_of_suffix < string.length) {
		suffix = string.slice(beginning_of_suffix);
		if (isPalindrome(suffix)) {
			longest_suffix = suffix.length;
			beginning_of_suffix += longest_suffix;
		}
		else {
			break;
		}

	while (beginning_of_prefix < string.length) {
		prefix = string.slice(beginning_of_prefix);

			longest_prefix = prefix.length;
			beginning_of_prefix += longest_prefix;
		}
		else {
			break;
		}
	}
	return string.slice(0, beginning_of_prefix) + longest_suffix + string.slice(beginning_of_prefix + longest_prefix);
}

}

	roundedAvg(10, 20) => "0b1111"
	roundedAvg(20, 33) => "0b11010"
	*/
const roundedAvg = (n, m) => {
	if (n > m) { return -1 }
	let k = (n + m) / 2
	let sum = 0
	for (let i = n; i <= m; i++) {
		sum += i
	}
	return Math.round(sum / (k - n + 1))
}

	[4, 2, 1, 2, 2, 1, 1, 1, 1, 4, 4]

const parseMusic = (music_string) => {

	}
